danata wasara 02 kata prathama tharawkaruwekuge margayen widesha rakiya eejansiyak haraha saudi arabiye gruha sewikawak lesa sewaya sandaha giya bawath 2014.08.24 dina sita aya sewaya karamin siti niwasin athurudanwa athi thama birindage mala sirura masa 4 kata pamana pasuwa athahara damana lada maduwaka thibi gowi mahathek wisin soyagena athi bawath, ee pilibandawa saudi arabi polisiya parikshana pawathwana bawata, thaman widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye konsiyular anshayata karana lada paminillakata pasuwa ehi niyojya adhyaksha ke. em. aar. perera mahatha wisin 2015.01.30 dathamin thaman wetha lithawa danwa athi bawata dab. ee. wasantha kumara mahatha maskeliya polisiyata paminili kara atha.

brithanya ithihasaya, shri lankika paripalana ithihasaya,deshapalanaya, wanija upakrama,yatath wijitha yugaya, mahamarga idikirima, purwa yatath wijitha samaye udarata wasiyange dadayam krama,shri lankawe guwan widuli sanniwedana kramaye wikashaya,krikat kridawa saha ehi kramika wikashaya,handa naluwe ithihasaya saha wikashaya,deshabhimani githa kalawa,mahawali wyaparaya, pesale khanijathel kanime wyapruthiya,haputhale pradeshaye bhu wishamatha lakshana saha sampradayika prawahana kramawalata in athiwana balapama,wamanshika wruththiya samithi wyaparaye nangima saha basima,aadarshayata gatha haki prabandhathmaka ithihasa katha,lankiya deshapalana ithihasaye itu nowunu porondu,yanthranusarayen kes kapimehidi gelehi athiwana kithiya pilibanda wimarshanayak,rajaye chithrapata anshaye parihaniya,amarikanu abhyawakasha tharanayehi kramika diyunuwa saha prathama sanda gamana, supa shasthra widhi saha krama,wedika natya kalawa saha ehi janapriyathawayata natya githawala bala pama,aasiyawe aashcharya saha wiruddha pakshaye chanda apekshakayin rangana charitha rajaye rupawahini nalikawalin athurudan wima.nili rajinan saha nalu rajun sattambai sewayehi diwa rathriyehi niratha weddi wiruddha pakshayakin mathiwaranayata idiripath wimata pamana sruhuwu awashesha naluwange kasherukawa pilibanda wimarshanayak,
